name: food_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dietagram.
Tool description: Find nutrition facts by food name or by UPC (barcode). API supports English, Russian, Polish, Spanish, Bulgarian, Ukrainian
API description: Fetches food information based on the given name.

name.description: The name of the food item for which information is being retrieved.

lang.description: Lang is necessary for search in the certain lang food base.  It will be detected automatically or you could set manually from this set of values (\\\"en\\\", \\\"ru\\\", \\\"pl\\\", \\\"bg\\\", \\\"de\\\", \\\"es\\\", \\\"ua\\\", \\\"by\\\")
